name: Javonda Robinson
text: The service is always superb and the food is hot, fresh and delicious.  The one time they made an error on our order they went above and beyond to make sure we were compensated.

name: anonymous user
text: My kids loved the pizza, greasy but good. No complaints here.

name: Josie Moore
text: Love all the choices in sauces to use on my pizza. I hadn't been able to eat pizza with tomato based sauce for a while but I can enjoy it again!

name: Richard Green
text: Love this location and service.  Since the COVID-19 pandemic my family's been ordering out. The food is great and the online selection process was user friendly.

name: Jill Hernandez
text: I have ordered twice from this place and each time they overcooked my pizza... learned my lesson, never again! Poor excuse for a Pizza Hut...

name: brenda brown
text: Small and convenient. Best veggie pizza in town.

name: Cindy Jones
text: Quick and friendly. The cashier shared a coupon with us , so niceüòÅ

name: Cierra Robinson
text: Everytime we go there is something wrong. Some things are worth complaining about so we don't say anything.  But they need to do something about their wings. They were cold and dry. They tasted recooked, the breading was falling off. But the pizza was actually hot.

name: Amy Bacon
text: Great service pizza was awesome I personally didn't care for the wings sauce was way too strong. Delivery man was really nice!

name: Latasha Anthony
text: I had to give them five stars.. They got my order right... The crew that was working were very nice and polite..

name: Sonya Simon
text: The young girl at  the counter, was wonderful!  Two young boy's in the back were making pizza, while goofing off.  I was engaged in conversation with a veteran who served during war.  I heard a pizza pan hit the floor 2 times and people who ‚Ä¶More

name: Zakiya Miller
text: Best pizza hut in the area.

name: KISHA JOHNSON
text: The pizza was very good, but the only thing I didn't like is that the person making the pizza didn't have on gloves when I went there the second time around.

name: Amy Bacon
text: Always been a fan of Pizza Hut - but ordered about a week ago and after two hours of waiting for my pizza I called and canceled.  They offered no excuse. no apology -nothing just simply said okay we will cancel you order.  Haven't called ‚Ä¶More

name: PJ Dunn

text: Rude staff, Poor management, orders always wrong. Will not give any more trys.

name: Kathy Jacobs
text: Pizza arrived in good time and was hot but there were a few pieces that had no cheese on them at all! Very disappointed.

name: Jacob Varnadoe
text: This manager Hank, hung up on my girlfriend, then hung up on me twice after me calling to simply ask where my pizza was that was ordered over an hour ago. (I live 2.8 miles from pizza hut and ordered 1 pepperoni pizza). I had to go to the ‚Ä¶More

name: Beth fleming
text: They are rude, dont care and always mess up my order this yet another order they messed up.. I wish Papa johns or Domino's would start delivering in our area.

name: Anthony Hylick
text: The cinnasticks were hardsr than my trig test

name: Phillip Searcy
text: I live 7.6 miles (12 min drive)from the place and they stopped delivering to my area.. Will be talking to corporate

name: Mark Perado
text: Good pizza, but had to repeat my order three different times.

name: Abigail Jenkins
text: Ordered online and went up there, when they said they didn't get our order in, when it says online that it went through. We stood for nearly ten minutes in line while the cashier talked on the phone, and eventually just left.

name: David Ortiz
text:
Horrible Grammer from the employees when calling . Not professional at all
. If you do not like your job then quit. Don't be rude , last time I will ever call ..

text: Perfect customer service.

name: Telisa Swan

name: Caroline Fielding
text: Pizza was really bad. Hard to find any mushrooms or olives on my two topping pizza and the cheese was almost burned.

name: Malinda Lynn
text: Usually a top choice of places to take the kids!

text: Ordered my food, went inside paid, walked out with food, went home, ENJOYED!!!!
